thread.title: Randonneur

author: Randonneur
title: Randonneur
text: I ordered a pair of Oakley prescription sports glasses from Smart Buy Glasses because they had the best price. I gave them one less star because the website indicated that the item was in stock and would ship the following day upon order. The order did not actually ship the day after, I think it shipped 3-4 days later after I placed the order.
